html:
7.10.20  6:04 pm   Why are you so patient

Â Â Â Â Â  i guess i just got so sick of being impatient

7.10.20  6:01 pm   do you remember the day we pretended to be every star in the sky?

Â Â Â Â Â  no but that reminds me of something in the future

7.10.20  6:01 pm   Any tips for mowing lawns more efficiently?

Â Â Â Â Â  you can staple 2 lawnmowers together

7.10.20  5:58 pm   I miss the airport terminal. Do you?

Â Â Â Â Â  yes

7.10.20  5:56 pm   Why do I exist?

Â Â Â Â Â  to show others how it's done

7.10.20  5:44 pm   the streets Word on says you're making a video new?

Â Â Â Â Â  that doesn't sound like enough videos but whatever

7.10.20  5:30 pm   How do you find inspiration for your music and videos?

Â Â Â Â Â  i have a bucket to catch the inspiration but sometimes the bucket itself inspires me

7.10.20  5:23 pm   I know you dislike people adding genre labels to your music,

Â Â Â Â Â that's not true, it's more fun than even the finest game of dodge ball

     and my original take-away was that you were going for that Schoenberg/Cage atonal jazz fusion aesthetic, but then I rescinded it after learning your opinion on the matter.

Â Â Â Â Â never heard of it

     Are you trying to develop your own genre,

Â Â Â Â Â you have to create genres, if you're not creating genres then how are you supposed to keep up with the genres themselves which have been creating genres this whole time

     or is there another ulterior motive to the music you're composing?    

Â Â Â Â Â everything i have ever seen or heard of is a motive to make music

7.10.20  5:14 pm   im glad bill isnt  dead but what is coming next for your videos? 1 big one or like a bunch of videos that are short but still good

Â Â Â Â Â  how about a bunch of videos that are a very nice good length while also being good

7.10.20  5:10 pm   what music inspired you to do music yourself?

Â Â Â Â Â any

     also what genre do you consider yourself?

Â Â Â Â Â normal

7.10.20  4:59 pm   Will you ever capitalize a letter in your reply?

Â Â Â Â Â  lord knows, i've done it before

7.10.20  4:53 pm   In the unboxing vid, is what's inside the forbidden box whatever you imagine it to be?

Â Â Â Â Â  only until you open it

7.10.20  4:44 pm   Do you have other talent we never seen you practice?

Â Â Â Â Â  maybe

7.10.20  4:40 pm   Have you ever thought about making an album?

Â Â Â Â Â  hopefully something better

7.10.20  4:28 pm   What's your favorite street sign?

Â Â Â Â Â  i assume somewhere there's gotta be signs that say 'start'

7.10.20  4:21 pm   How do you make your videos so awesomely awesome

Â Â Â Â Â  we'll see

7.10.20  3:51 pm   Where do you get inspiration from?

Â Â Â Â Â  from the toilet, in the gutter. bet you didn't think they had toilets in the gutter, well here i am, as living proof

7.10.20  3:45 pm   will the practice videos you've been working on as part of the overhaul of the graphics department be released to your website?

Â Â Â Â Â most of them

     if so, when will they be released?

Â Â Â Â Â  after some non-practice ones come out. or in some cases, right before

7.10.20  2:18 pm   can you type in capital letters?

Â Â Â Â Â  yes i actually type most of the letters in my videos, which as you know are famous for capital letters

7.10.20  2:14 pm   what plant resembles you the most?

Â Â Â Â Â  palm tree

7.10.20  2:08 pm   Why is it called a W instead of a double V?

Â Â Â Â Â  to save time, which in turn saves money and helps the economy

7.10.20  1:59 pm   I Need a brand new garbage can can you help me out

Â Â Â Â Â  i'll ask around

7.10.20  1:52 pm   Are you working on a super secret government video to destroy democracy and promote communism.?

Â Â Â Â Â  surprisingly close

7.10.20  1:28 pm   What's the deal with boy bands?

Â Â Â Â Â  no girls allowed

7.10.20  1:24 pm   Cool to hear you're working on video making. I remember you discussed some issues with the olD pRoGRam on the h3 podcast. Did you move to the nEw PRogRAm? Do you feel good about the switch?

Â Â Â Â Â  it turns out, as i delve deeper into my personality type, i might be better off making my own programs

7.10.20  1:20 pm   Who's your biggest musical influence?

Â Â Â Â Â  could be you

7.10.20  12:37 pm   Are u working on a vid

Â Â Â Â Â  that doesn't sound like enough videos but whatever

7.10.20  12:09 pm   What editing software do you use? Lol just asking.

Â Â Â Â Â  we'll see

7.10.20  11:47 am   i have a cat named dog

Â Â Â Â Â  oh that's classic

7.10.20  11:46 am   If you had a favorite chord extension, what would it be? Mines either min9 or min9#11

Â Â Â Â Â  in my world, those are not extensions. those are something that lives inside the chord, not usually on the ends. in fact the only place i have ever heard of those being called extensions are in text books.... never in actual music

7.10.20  11:22 am   are you developing a new editing software?

Â Â Â Â Â  not yet, still dealing with how to create the content in the first place

7.10.20  11:20 am   do you like to break rules

Â Â Â Â Â  no way

7.10.20  11:00 am   What would you play on the b section of donna lee?

Â Â Â Â Â  i don't reckon it has a B section

7.10.20  10:41 am   How do you make your songs so good?

Â Â Â Â Â  by setting up a series of shadow companies i've been able to inconspicuously sell my soul to myself

7.10.20  10:29 am   Do you plan to guest star on any other podcasts?

Â Â Â Â Â  would be nice if i could be the host

7.10.20  10:13 am   What is the genre of your music?

Â Â Â Â Â normal

     Does it mean to be sound like jazz fusion or something?

Â Â Â Â Â i'm just trying to get by

      Btw I can consider that you've created a genre because it really sounds like different from the other music.

Â Â Â Â Â you have to create genres, if you're not creating genres then how are you supposed to keep up with the genres themselves which have been creating genres this whole time

     (sorry for the long message)

Â Â Â Â Â

Â Â Â Â Â  scientists estimate that the average person lives in Ohio

Â Â Â Â Â  never heard of it

Â Â Â Â Â  do a medium thing. it will seem great compared to the other thing

Â Â Â Â Â  i have no choice. everything is poetry

Â Â Â Â Â  as many as you can imagine

Â Â Â Â Â  i'll see what i can do

Â Â Â Â Â  working on videomaking

MILLIONS AND MILLIONS OF PEOPLE want u to upload place answer why you stopped
